name: Dotcraft Color Art Plus
description:
Create your own work of art. Color extraordinary pictures arranged from dots. Use shiny crystals to achieve an amazing look. Try to combine different textures of dots, it also gives interesting results. Apply colors according to original template or ignore it, experiment.

Features:
- 20 pictures to color,
- 70 colors to choose from,
- three types of dots (ball, shiny gem and gem),
- saving work progress.

New images are constantly added.

If you are not sure about this game, try first the lite version - DotCraft Unique Color Art Lite.
